com.seagate.csp.gui

Class Gui

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.seagate.csp.gui.dlg.DialogImpl
      • com.seagate.csp.gui.dlg.JFrameDialog
        • com.seagate.csp.gui.dlg.JFrameConnectionDialog
          • com.seagate.csp.gui.Gui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionListener, Dialog, Expirable, Startable, Destroyable, java.util.EventListener

    public class Gui
extends JFrameConnectionDialog
implements Destroyable
    Main GUI application class. Note on the threading model: everything here must happen on the AWT event thread. There is one exception to this rule: some of classes in com.seagate.csp.gui.conn are thread safe and synchronized. The events from them must be routed to the event thread.
